en.title: Upload tribunal form
en.line1: Please upload the First-tier tribunal form that you have already completed.
en.line2: If you have other evidence or supporting documents, you can upload these files on the next screen.
en.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, PDF
  • File size per document: up to 100 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected
  • Only a maximum of 5 files can be uploaded on this page

You can’t upload executable (.exe), .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.
en.uploadGuidance: Once you have selected the file click "Upload file" to upload it.

cy.title: Llwytho ffurflen y tribiwnlys
cy.line1: Llwythwch ffurflen y Tribiwnlys Haen Gyntaf rydych wedi’i llenwi’n barod.
cy.line2: Os oes gennych dystiolaeth arall neu ddogfennau ategol, gallwch lwytho’r ffeiliau hyn ar y sgrin nesaf.
cy.uploadRequirement:
• Fformatau ffeiliau: MS Word, PDF
  • Maint ffeil pob dogfen: hyd at 100 megabeit (MB)
  • Ni ellir llwytho ffeiliau sydd wedi’u diogelu â chyfrinair

Ni allwch lwytho ffeiliau gweithredu (.exe), ffeiliau zip neu ffeiliau eraill oherwydd y risg o firws.
cy.uploadGuidance: Unwaith y byddwch wedi dewis y ffeil, cliciwch ar "Llwytho ffeil" i’w llwytho.

en.SIZE_ERROR: File size exceeds the maximum permitted value. Upload a file that is less than 100 MB
en.FORMAT_ERROR: This service only accepts files in the formats - Ms Word, PDF
en.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: You can upload 5 files only. Delete one of the uploaded files and retry
en.CONTINUE_WITHOUT_UPLOAD_ERROR: You must upload the application before you can proceed further
en.UPLOAD_DELETE_FAIL_ERROR: Document upload or deletion has failed. Try again

cy.SIZE_ERROR: Mae maint y ffeil yn fwy na 100Mb. Llwythwch ffeil sy’n llai na 100Mb
cy.FORMAT_ERROR: Dim ond ffeiliau yn y fformatau canlynol y gall y gwasanaeth hwn dderbyn - Ms Word, PDF
cy.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: Gallwch lwytho hyd at 5 ffeil yn unig. Dylech ddileu un o’r ffeiliau a lwythwyd a rhoi cynnig arall arni
cy.CONTINUE_WITHOUT_UPLOAD_ERROR: Ni allwch barhau heb lwytho’r cais
cy.UPLOAD_DELETE_FAIL_ERROR: Mae llwytho neu ddileu’r ffeil wedi methu. Rhowch gynnig arall arni
